translations.translation: Truly you are one of the Messengers
That you are indeed one of those sent
you are truly among the Messengers,
You (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) are indeed one of the Noble Messengers.
Truly, you are one of the Messengers,
Most surely you are one of the apostles
thou art truly among the Envoys
Lo! thou art of those sent
you are indeed one of the messengers
Verily thou art of the sent ones,
you are indeed one of the apostles,
Thou art indeed one of the messengers,
Truly, you (O Muhammad SAW) are one of the Messengers,
you (Prophet Muhammad) are truly among the Messengers sent
You are one of the messengers.
Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,
[36:3] you, O Muhammad (s), are indeed of those sent [by God],

Lo! thou art) O Muhammad (of those sent) it is also said that this is an oath by which Allah swore: He swore by the Ya', the Sin and the wise Qur'an and He did also swear by the Qur'an which exposits the lawful and the unlawful, the commands and prohibitions.

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: { إنك } بسبب هذه الثلاثة { لِمن المُرْسَلين تَنْزيل العزيز الرحيم } أي: القرآن الشامل للحكمة الذي هو صورة كمال استعدادك تنزيل بإظهاره مفصلاً من مكمن الجمع على مظهرك ليكون فرقاناً من العزيز الغالب الذي غلب على أنائيتك وصفات نشأتك وقهرها بقوّته لئلا تظهر وتمنع ظهور القرآن المكنون في غيبك على مظهر قلبك وصيرورته فرقاناً

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنَّكَ } يا أكمل الرسل وخاتم الأنبياء، المبعوث إلى كافة البرايا { لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ } [يس: 3] المتمكنين
